tmdefinition: The textural maturity of sandstones encompasses three textural properties:(1) the amount of clay-size sediment in the rock, (2) the sorting of the framework grains, and (3) the rounding of the framework grains. And four stages of textural maturity were visualized: immature, submature, mature, and supermature
tmreferences: Folk R L. Stages of textural maturity in sedimentary rocks. Journal of Sedimentary Research, 1951, 21(3): 127-130
